name: Hiking Simulator? (shibest)
description:
Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, space to jump, r to sprint

Download to play, game is unfinished and still in development.

Created by Null Exception. 

Hiking Simulator? is a 3D horror  game where the objective is to reach the top of the mountain.  However, there may be scary surprises on the way!  This game was made for the Scream Jam 2021.  Due to lack of time, there is no real way to win, however this game will be continually developed to the best it can be.  Thanks for playing!
